Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:45:41
Folder: CYNJ3BC - store closure - korloff dubai mall on wed 23rd oct 2024
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CYNJ3BC_00
From: Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>
To: Group Security Control Room <GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>
CC: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-23 12:37
Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Korloff Dubai Mall on Wed 23rd Oct 2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Korloff Dubai Mall on Wednesday 23rd Oct 2024 and hoarding will be installed after trading hours.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (CCTV Dismantling once documents received ) @Korloff Dubaimall <mailto:Korloff.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Mouayad Almouallem <mailto:Mouayad.Almouallem@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 23rd  Oct. @Korloff Dubaimall <mailto:Korloff.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Mouayad Almouallem <mailto:Mouayad.Almouallem@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @Korloff Dubaimall <mailto:Korloff.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Mouayad Almouallem <mailto:Mouayad.Almouallem@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Romy @Korloff Dubaimall <mailto:Korloff.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Mouayad Almouallem <mailto:Mouayad.Almouallem@chalhoub.com>  
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR are dismantled whenever we receive permit.

@Mouayad Almouallem <mailto:Mouayad.Almouallem@chalhoub.com>  
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR are dismantled whenever we receive permit.

*	IT Equipment dismantling on 24th Oct before trading hours by @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 
*	All contracts documents to be cancelled on 24th Oct  @Shibu <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Connie <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Mary <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG team to collect all cash from boutique on 24th Oct morning and cancel their service as well from 25TH Oct.
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure to share the Audited sales report after the store closure.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure Dewa Etisalat accounts are closed.
*	@Kiran Viswambharan <mailto:Kiran.Viswambharan@chalhoub.com>  @Merryn Raju <mailto:Merryn.Raju@chalhoub.com>  raise an MDM request to close store ID on 30th Oct.
*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  please share documents of SEFA to apply for permit.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.

Regards,
